This is an introduction to mixed models in R. It covers a many of the most common techniques employed in such models, and relies heavily on the lme4 package. The basics of random intercepts and slopes models, crossed vs.Â nested models, etc. are covered. Discussion includes extensions into generalized mixed models and realms beyond. [...]  ...
